item.title: Full Smithing help.(WIll rep++)(Delta 317)
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

i am sorry for bringing this topic back up for after so long but i was simply looking for something like this and i also know the ansa to your problem

it will say
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 436 && playerHasItem(438)){
deleteItem(436, 1);
deleteItem(438, 1);
addItem(2349, 1);
sM(“You smith the tin and copper ore.”);
setAnimation(899);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(1600, 13);

The additem is what you will get if u use that together if u have
additem (995, 150) this means it will give u 150 coins so change the id and the ammount u want

item.title: Full Smithing help.(WIll rep++)(Delta 317)
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey all.

I need a good smithing tutorial,i have looked but i cant find one.

Basically,on my server,you put like copper and tin in the furnace and you get a bar.But,when you use the bar on the anvil(with the hammer)it just gives coins.

Here is what i want it to do:I want it so that you get the smithing screen up(looking like this)

smithing.jpg761×332

Thing is,when i open up the smithing interface on my client,it looks like this.
(i simply do ::interface 994)(the white background is made by my co,that bit isnt bugged)

0184-1.png765×503

Now,as you can see,there is no pictures for the items,and it just generally looks bugged.

Now for my code in client.java.

I search for "You smith the bar into some gold"because thats the message i get.
So,here is what it looks like in my client.java.

}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2644 && ItemID == 1737){
deleteItem(1737, 1);
addItem(1759, 1);
setAnimation(894);
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2349 && playerHasItem(2347)){
deleteItem(2349, 1);
sM("You smith the bar into some gold.");
addItem(995, 100);
setAnimation(898);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(100, 13);
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2351 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 15){
deleteItem(2351, 1);
sM("You smith the bar into some gold.");
addItem(995, 200);
setAnimation(898);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(150, 13);
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2359 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 60){
deleteItem(2359, 1);
sM("You smith the bar into some gold.");
addItem(995, 300);
setAnimation(898);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(300, 13);
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2361 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 70){
deleteItem(2361, 1);
sM("You smith the bar into some gold.");
addItem(995, 2000);
setAnimation(898);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(400, 13);
}
if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2363 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 85){
deleteItem(2363, 1);
sM("You smith the bar into some gold.");
addItem(995, 150);
setAnimation(898);
faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID);
addSkillXP(500, 13);
}

So,how can i get it to use the full smithing interface and make it all work
If you answer,i WILL rep you(only if you answer correctly obviously.)
ALL feedback and help is appreciated.
Im using delta 317

Read full topic
